mapper.sql: category_id AS categoryId, parent_id AS parentId, name, sort, type, status, show_in_nav AS showInNav, show_in_top AS showInTop, show_in_hot AS showInHot, create_time AS createTime, create_by AS createBy, update_time AS updateTime, update_by AS updateBy, page_title AS pageTitle, page_description AS pageDescription, page_keyword AS pageKeyword, remarks
mapper.select: SELECT c.category_id, name, category_advert_id, title, href, pic_img FROM os_category c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a1.* FROM os_category_advert a1 WHERE ( SELECT count(1) FROM os_category_advert WHERE category_id = a1.category_id AND sort < a1.sort ) < #{advertNumber} AND STATUS = #{status} AND begin_time <= #{date} AND end_time >= #{date} ) a ON c.category_id = a.category_id WHERE type = #{type} AND c. STATUS = #{status} AND c.show_in_top = #{showInTop} ORDER BY c.sort, a.sort
